metadata.title: SheetMark - Convert Spreadsheets to Markdown Tables
metadata.description: Easily convert your spreadsheet data from CSV, TSV, or by pasting directly into a clean Markdown table. Fast, free, and easy to use.
metadata.keywords: spreadsheet to markdown, csv to markdown, excel to markdown, table converter, markdown table generator, sheetmark, hoja de calculo a markdown, csv a markdown
